original_text: He knows how to cut valuable stones and make them look beautiful. He knows how to cut wood into different shapes. He is very clever at all kinds of beautiful work. He knows how to cut valuable stones and make them look beautiful. He knows how to cut wood into different shapes. He is very clever at all kinds of beautiful work. He knows how to cut valuable stones and make them look beautiful. He knows how to cut wood into different shapes. He is very clever at all kinds of beautiful work.
korean_text: 보석을 깎아 물리며 나무를 새기는 여러 가지 정교한 일을 하게 하셨고

sentences.original_text: He knows how to cut valuable stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 귀한 돌을 다듬는 법을 압니다

sentences.original_text: He knows how to cut wood into different shapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나무를 여러 모양으로 자르는 법을 압니다

sentences.original_text: He is very clever at all kinds of beautiful work
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 종류의 아름다운 작품을 만드는 데 매우 능숙합니다
